observations.notes: Failed once on 2025-12-09, did not recur on 2025-12-10 and later. Likely timing or data initialization issue.

Failed 2025-12-10 (app crash due to threading), fixed in commit 768e54411. Failed again 2025-12-11 with 'License expired! not exist'. Resolved 2025-12-12. Threading fix successful, banner display issue was transient.
